name: Garbage Trucker
description:
In this game you are a garbage truck driver and your task is to pull this huge monster on these amazing offroads through the specified rings and take it to a highlighted location. The faster you run, the more risky it becomes as the hills are steep.
Features:
* Outstanding 3 Dimensional Graphics
* Smart Missions
* Crazy Experience.
* Smooth Game Play
* Environments That Keeps Changing
* Real Physics
